original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sūpam pi odanam pi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
analyzed: kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sūpam pi odanam pi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave sūpam pi odanam pi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissatha.
analyzed: kathañhi nāma tumhe mogha purisā sūpam pi odanam pi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Na sūpaṁ vā odanaṁ vā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sūpam vā odanam vā attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānāḥ honti
gilāna pucchakāḥ bhikkhū gilāne bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjāma, tena no phāsu hoti.
analyzed: pubbe mayaḥ āvuso sūpam pi odanam pi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjāma tena no phāsu hoti

original: ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavatā paṭikkhittanti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema tena naḥ na phāsu hoti iti

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave gilānena bhikkhunā sūpam pi odanam pi attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Na sūpaṁ vā odanaṁ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sūpam vā odanam vā a gilānaḥ attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Na sūpaṁ vā odanaṁ vā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: na sūpam vā odanam vā a gilānena attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjitabba

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sūpaṁ vā odanaṁ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sūpam vā odanam vā a gilānaḥ attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa
